SAMRAI::hier::ConnectorStatistics

SAMRAI::hier::ConnectorStatistics Class Reference

Detailed Description

A utility for writing out various statistics of Connectors.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SAMRAI::hier::ConnectorStatistics::ConnectorStatistics ( const Connector &  connector  )  [explicit]

Constructor.

Compute and store statistics for the given Connector. The statistics reflects the current Connector state and can be printed out afterwards. All processes in the Connector's SAMRAI_MPI must call this constructor because it requires collective communication.

Parameters:
[in] connector

Print out local and globally reduced statistics on the Boxes.
